document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Habropogon Loew, 1847 (Diptera: Asilidae) from Russia, with description of new species from Siberia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the genus Habropogon Loew, 1847 (Diptera: Asilidae) from Russia, with description of new species from Siberia

bibRefCitation.author: Loew
bibRefCitation.refString: Loew, H. (1871) Turkestanskie dvukrylye [Turkestanish Diptera]. Izvestiya Imperatorskogo obshchestva lyubiteley estestvoznaniya, antropologii i etnografii, 9 (1), 51 - 59.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Habropogon latifrons
Loew, 1871 : 85
, type locality "Зеравшанская долина [Sarawschan-Tal, A.P. Fedtschenko]" [Tadjikistan]; Engel 1930: 390;
Lehr 1960 : 186
, ♂, ♀ (Russia: Astrakhan Prov.); 1964: 307, ♂, ♀; 1988: 241.
